question_text: Which of the following best describes why wireless antennas are routed into the display bezel of laptops?
answer_options: To cool the Wi-Fi module during operation
To keep the system board closer to the signal source
To ensure the antennas are elevated for better reception
To avoid exposure to static electricity near the keyboard
correct_answer: To ensure the antennas are elevated for better reception
explanation: The elevation provided by the display bezel improves signal clarity and range for wireless connectivity.
